q_en: What is the progress of sewing tasks for William?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'William';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "William"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 8;
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for the customer "William"

steps.sql: SELECT order_id, SUM(number) as total_quantity FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (8) GROUP BY order_id;
steps.description: Retrieve the total quantity of products in each order for the customer "William"

steps.sql: SELECT st.order_product_id, SUM(st.completed_number) as completed_quantity FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE op.order_id IN (8) GROUP BY st.order_product_id;
steps.description: Retrieve the total completed quantity of all sewing tasks for each order for the customer "William"

steps.sql: SELECT op.order_id, (SUM(st.completed_number) / SUM(op.number)) * 100 as progress_percentage FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE op.order_id IN (8) GROUP BY op.order_id;
steps.description: Calculate the progress of sewing tasks for each order for the customer "William"

response:
Hello there! üòÑ Let's take a look at the progress of sewing tasks for our customer, William. Here's a summary of the information:

| Order ID | Total Quantity | Completed Quantity | Progress Percentage |
|----------|----------------|--------------------|---------------------|
| 8        | 585            | 585                | 100%                |

Great news! üéâ All sewing tasks for William's order have been completed, reaching a perfect 100% progress. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! üòä
